main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were sighted over Birmingham, Alabama in 1952, including a pale blue light and two elliptical or oval-shaped objects.
interesting points: A single pale blue light was reported to be considerably brighter than aircraft lights and moved very fast., Two elliptical objects were reported over Birmingham with a diameter of 30 to 40 feet., A red oval-shaped object followed a commercial airline's aircraft for 10 to 15 seconds before accelerating away., Observers reported no unusual sounds during the sightings., Reports indicated the objects could not be identified as any known aircraft.
sighted object: pale blue light, elliptical or oval-shaped objects, red oval-shaped object
witness description: commercial airline pilot, co-pilot, and military personnel
